LanguageData.STF.ForbidWhenMovingTT: Will forbid any item that floats away from a stockpile that allows the item. This will stop pawns from constantly try to return items that float away.
LanguageData.STF.DespawnAtMapEdgeTT: Floating things will despawn instead of being stopped by the map edge.
LanguageData.STF.SpawnNewItemsTT: Things can spawn at the edge of the map if there is a river flowing.
LanguageData.STF.MaxSpawnValueTT: The maximum value of each stack of items spawned in rivers.
